This problem still persists -- I noticed that this bug was reported back in May. Optimizer still insists on placing enchants on offhands items though. This is problematic because, for instance, Optimizer is recommending I enchant my offhand with 25 crit/25 hit. Well, when I remove the enchant, that means I need to make up 25 hit elsewhere.
Â 
In theory, Rawr shouldn't allow enchants to go on any non-weapon off-hand items or wands (which was also a problem at one point).

Comments.Message: What model, and what weapons? We need to know more about this bug.

I get the same problem on RAWR 2.1.4

I have my mage loaded and it's telling me I need to have offhand enchants and Wand Enchants - but they are not allowed. The Wand Enchants are actually scopes for guns. 

I have a Carved Witch Doctors Stick Wand and Fetish of the Primal Gods for my offhand.
Can you explain what you mean better? We don't know what this bug is. What's the problem? How is it 'telling you you need to have offhand enchants and wand enchants'?
